title: ATOM ITSP Review Assessment
completedHtml:
Thanks for completing an ATOM

A summary will be emailed to:

Please ensure the summary is uploaded to the client file

elements.name: AssessmentDate
elements.title: Date of Assessment

elements.name: AssessmentType
elements.title: Assessment Type

elements.name: Program
elements.title: Program Details

elements.name: Staff
elements.title: Team Members

elements.name: ClientType
elements.title: Client Type

elements.name: Relationship
elements.title: Your relationship to the person using alcohol or other drugs?

pages.name: maindoc

elements.name: PDC
elements.title: Main Substance of Concern / Gambling

columns.name: PDCSubstanceOrGambling
columns.title: Drug of concern/Gambling
choices: GHB type Drugs and Analogues, n.e.c.
Other Anabolic Agents and Selected Hormones, n.e.c.
Peptide Hormones, Mimetics and Analogues, n.e.c.

columns.name: PDCHowMuchPerOccasion
columns.title: How much per occasion of use?

elements.confirmDeleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this drug?

elements.name: PDCnotes
elements.title: Notes

pages.title: Current Main Substance of Concern / Gambling
pages.description: (for Arcadia clients, please record substance of concern on entry to program)

pages.name: odoc

elements.name: Anyodc
elements.title: Any other drugs of concern?

elements.name: ODC
elements.title: Other Substances of Concern / Gambling
elements.description: Including non-current substance use (up to a maximum of 5).

columns.name: HowMuchPerOccasion
columns.title: How much per occasion of use?

columns.name: Goals
choices: Not wanting to change substance use

elements.confirmDeleteText: Are you sure you want to delete this drug?

elements.name: NotesODC
elements.title: Notes

elements.name: HaveYouEverInjected
elements.title: Have you ever injected substances?

elements.name: HowLongSinceLastInjected
elements.title: Injecting Drug Status
elements.description: How long since you last injected?
choices: More than three months but less than twelve months ago

elements.name: HaveYouEverSharedEquipment
elements.title: Have you shared any injecting equipment? (including needles, syringes, waters, spoons, filters)

elements.name: Past4WkNumInjectingDays
elements.title: Number of injecting days in the last 4 weeks?

pages.title: Other Substances of Concern
pages.description: (for Arcadia House clients, please record ODC on entry to the program)

pages.name: SDS

elements.name: SDSIsAODUseOutOfControl
elements.title: Do you ever think that your drug / alcohol use is out of control?

elements.name: SDSDoesMissingFixMakeAnxious
elements.title: Does the prospect of missing a session / fix make you very anxious or nervous?

elements.name: SDSHowMuchDoYouWorryAboutAODUse
elements.title: How much do you worry about your use of drugs / alcohol?

elements.name: SDSDoYouWishToStop
elements.title: Do you wish you could stop?

elements.name: SDSHowDifficultToStopOrGoWithout
elements.title: How difficult would you find it to stop or go without your substance of concern?

elements.name: SDS_Score
elements.title: SDS Score

pages.title: Severity of Dependence Scale
pages.description: (in relation to Main Drug of Concern)

elements.name: DoYouSmoke
elements.title: Do you smoke cigarettes or nicotine vapes?

elements.name: TobaccoAsSpin
elements.title: Do you use tobacco as spin with your marijuana?

elements.name: MotivationToQuit
elements.title: How motivated are you to quit or reduce your smoking?

elements.name: ManagingQuitting
elements.title: How well are you managing in trying to quit or reduce your smoking?

choices.text: Not well - I haven't been able to make any changes to my smoking
It's a challenge but I'm still trying
I'm managing really well - successfully quitting or educing

elements.name: CDS5RateAddictiontoCigarettes
elements.title: Please rate your addiction to cigarettes on a scale of 1-100 (NOT addicted to cigarettes at all = 0 / Extremely addicted to cigarettes = 100)

elements.name: CDS5HowManyCigarettesPerDay
elements.title: On average, how many cigarettes do you smoke per day?

elements.name: CDS5HowSoonAfterWaking
elements.title: Usually, how soon after waking up do you smoke your first cigarette?

elements.name: CDS5HowHardIsQuitting
elements.title: For you, quitting smoking would be:

elements.name: CDS5HowStrongTheUrgeToSmoke
elements.title:
Do you agree with the following statement?                           
After a few hours without smoking, I feel an irresistible urge to smoke

elements.name: CDS5_Score
elements.title: CDS 5

elements.name: Past4WkAodRisks
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks, have you experienced any of the following risks?
choices: Using more than one drug at a time
Driving with drugs and/or alcohol in your system
Overdose or hospitalisation from drinking / using drugs
Attended by an ambulance or been in hospital

elements.name: Past4WkAnyOtherAddictiveB
elements.title: Did you engage in any other behaviours of dependence in the last 4 weeks?

elements.name: OtherAddictiveBehaviours
elements.title: Other Behaviours of Dependence

elements.name: NotesBehaviours
elements.title: Notes on Behaviours of Dependence

elements.name: SubstanceUseITSPIssues
elements.title: SUBSTANCE USE SUMMARY - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: SubstanceUseITSPGoals
elements.title: SUBSTANCE USE GOALS - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: Past4WkDailyLivingImpacted
elements.title: Impact on Daily Living
elements.description: During the last 4 weeks, how often has substance use (or other addictive behaviour) impacted on your work or other daily living activities (like: social, recreational. study, caring for family)?
choices: Three or four times per week

elements.name: Past4WkEngagedInOtheractivities
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks, have you engaged in any of the following?

columns.name: Frequency
choices: Three or four times per week

rows: Study - college, school or vocational education

elements.name: HowDoYouSpendTime
elements.title: Meaningful Use of Time
elements.description: Is there anything you would like to spend more time on?

choices.text: Other Behaviours of Dependence (eg. gaming, social media)

elements.name: PrioritiseCare
elements.title: Daily Care of Self & Others
elements.description: During the last 4 weeks, how well have you been able to prioritise and maintain the care and wellbeing of yourself and/or others that you are caring for?

elements.name: ManagingImpact
elements.title: Managing Impact
elements.description: How well are you able to manage the impact of another person's substance use on your life?

elements.name: SetBoundariesPrioritiseWellbeing
elements.title: How well are you able to set boundaries and prioritise your own wellbeing, when others around you are using substances?

elements.name: CapableManaging
elements.title: How capable do you feel about managing your daily activities ?

choices.text: Somewhat capable, but still need assistance
A little capable but need lots of assistance

elements.name: EverydayLivingITSPIssues
elements.title: EVERYDAY LIVINGÂ SUMMARY - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: EverydayLivingITSPGoals
elements.title: EVERYDAY LIVING GOALS - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: Past4WkDifficultyFindingHousing
elements.title: Housing Stability
elements.description: In the past 4 weeks, have you had any difficulties with housing or finding somewhere stable to live?
choices: Three or four times per week
elements.otherText: N/A - only for residents in Arcadia House longer than 4 weeks

elements.name: DoYouFeelSafeWhereYouLive
elements.title: Physical Safety
elements.description: Do you feel safe where you live?
choices: Often feel unsafe / Occasionally experience violence
Never feel safe / Constantly exposed to violence

elements.name: HousingSafetyITSPIssues
elements.title: HOUSING & SAFETYÂ SUMMARYÂ - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: HousingSafetyITSPGoals
elements.title: HOUSING & SAFETY GOALS - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: Past4WkPhysicalHealth
elements.title: How has your physical health been, in the last 4 weeks?

elements.name: Past4WkHowOftenPhysicalHealthCausedProblems
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks, how often has your physical health caused problems in your daily life?
choices: Three or four times per week

elements.name: Past4WkBeenHospCallAmbulance
elements.title: In the past 4 weeks have you been in hospital or needed to call an ambulance?

elements.name: Past4WkBeenHospCallAmbulanceNotes
elements.title: If Yes, please provide details

elements.name: AreYouCurrentlyTakingMeds
elements.title: Are you currently taking any medications (for either physical or mental health issues)?

elements.name: MedicationsNotes
elements.title: If Yes, please provide details

elements.name: PhysicalHealthITSPIssues
elements.title: PHYSICAL HEALTH & WELLBEINGÂ SUMMARYÂ - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: PhysicalHealthITSPGoals
elements.title: PHYSICAL HEALTH & WELLBEING GOALS - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: Past4WkMentalHealth
elements.title: How has your psychological / mental health been, in the last 4 weeks?
elements.description:
Do you have moods, fears, emotions or other thoughts that concern you?
(rate out of 10 ; 10 is the best possible)

elements.name: Past4WkHowOftenMentalHealthCausedProblems
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks, how often has your mental health created problems in your daily life?
choices: Three or four times per week

elements.name: MHRecentRiskIssues
elements.title: Mental Health - Recent Risk Issues
elements.description: (occurring in last 4 weeks - ONLY IF DISCLOSED BY CLIENT)
choices: Suicidal thoughts, ideation, planning, attempts (RISK ASSESSMENT)
Mood or affect concerns, including profound, persistent hopelessness (RISK ASSESSMENT)
Thought content concerns, including delusional content

elements.name: HowOftenNegativeFeelings
elements.title: How often do you have negative feelings such as blue mood, despair, anxiety, depression?

elements.name: doK10
elements.title: K10 assessment for psychological distress?

elements.name: K10Q01
elements.title: K10 Question 1 -  In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel tired out for no good reason?

elements.name: K10Q02
elements.title: K10 Question 2 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel nervous?

elements.name: K10Q03
elements.title: K10 Question 3 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel so nervous that nothing could calm you down?

elements.name: K10Q04
elements.title: K10 Question 4 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel hopeless?

elements.name: K10Q05
elements.title: K10 Question 5 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel restless or fidgety?

elements.name: K10Q06
elements.title: K10 Question 6 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel so restless you could not sit still?

elements.name: K10Q07
elements.title: K10 Question 7 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel depressed?

elements.name: K10Q08
elements.title: K10 Question 8 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel that everything was an effort?

elements.name: K10Q09
elements.title: K10 Question 9 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel so sad that nothing could cheer you up?

elements.name: K10Q10
elements.title: K10 Question 10 - In the last 4 weeks, about how often did you feel worthless?

elements.name: K10Q11
elements.title: K10+ Question 11 - In the last four weeks, how many days were you totally unable to work, study or manage your day to day activities because of these feelings?

elements.name: K10Q12
elements.title: K10+ Question 12 - Aside from the days above, in the last 4 weeks, how many days were you able to work or study or manage your day to day activities, but had to cut down on what you did because of these feelings?Â

elements.name: K10Q13
elements.title: K10+ Question 13 - In the last 4 weeks, how many timesÂ  have you seen a doctor or any other health professional about these feelings?

elements.name: K10Q14
elements.title: K10+ Question 14 - In the last 4 weeks, how often have physical  health problems been the main cause of these feelings?

elements.name: MentalITSPIssues
elements.title: MENTAL HEALTH & WELLBEINGÂ SUMMARYÂ - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: MentalHealthITSPGoals
elements.title: MENTAL HEALTH & WELLBEING GOALS - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: HaveAnySocialSupport
elements.title: Do you have any positive family and/or social support around you?

elements.name: Past4WkUseLedToProblemsWithFamilyFriend
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks, how often has substance use led to problems or arguments with family members or friends?
choices: Three or four times per week

elements.name: HaveDVOrFamilySafetyConcerns
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks have you had any domestic violence or (family) safety concerns?
choices: Yes - in the past 4 weeks (risk assessment required)

elements.name: Past4WkHaveYouViolenceAbusive
elements.title: Have you used violence or been abusive towards anyone, over the last 4 weeks?

elements.name: Past4WkHadCaregivingResponsibilities
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks, have you had any parenting / caregiving responsibilities?

elements.name: PrimaryCaregiver
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks were you the primary caregiver for, or living with, any children?
elements.commentText: If Yes - is the children's care impacted by either your own, or another person's, substance use?
choices: Yes - primary caregiver: children under 5 years old
Yes - primary caregiver: children 5 - 15 years old
Yes - primary caregiver: children 15 - 18 years old
Yes - parenting responsibilities but children don't live with me
Yes - parenting responsibilities for children other than my own
Living with children other than my own, but no parental responsibility

elements.name: ChildProtectionConcerns
elements.visibleIf: {PrimaryCaregiver} = ['Yes - primary caregiver: children under 5 years old', 'Yes - primary caregiver: children 5 - 15 years old', 'Yes - primary caregiver: children 15 - 18 years old', 'Yes - parenting responsibilities but children don\'t live with me', 'Yes - parenting responsibilities for children other than my own', 'Living with children other than my own, but no parental responsibility']
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks have there been any child protection concerns?
elements.description: Have either DCJ (NSW) or OCYFS (ACT) been involved with your family?

elements.name: ChildProtectionDetails
elements.title: If Yes, please provide details

elements.name: RelationshipsITSPIssues
elements.title: RELATIONSHIPS, PARENTING & SOCIAL WELLBEINGÂ SUMMARYÂ - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: RelationshipsITSPGoals
elements.title: RELATIONSHIPS, PARENTING & SOCIAL WELLBEING GOALS - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: Past4WkBeenArrested
elements.title: Have you been arrested in the last 4 weeks?

elements.name: Past4WkHowOftenIllegalActivities
elements.title: In the last 4 weeks, how often have you been involved in any illegal activities? (eg. DUI, assault, shoplifting, supplying drugs)?
choices: Three or four times per week

elements.name: LegalIssuesDueToOthersUse
elements.title: Have you experienced any legal issues as a result of another person's substance use?

elements.name: NeedHelpWrkDevlpmntOrdrPayingOutstndngFines
elements.title: Do you need help with a Work Development Order to pay off any outstanding fines?

elements.name: LegalITSPIssues
elements.title: LEGALÂ SUMMARYÂ - NOTES FOR ITSP

elements.name: LegalITSPGoals
elements.title: LEGAL GOALS - NOTES FOR ITSP

pages.name: right now

elements.name: HowCloseToManagingSubstanceUse
elements.title: How close are you to where you want to be in managing your substance use?

elements.name: Notes-HowCloseToManagingSubstanceUse
elements.title: Notes

elements.name: HowCloseToManagingImpactOfOthersUse
elements.title: How close are you to where you want to be in managing the impact of the other person's substance use?

elements.name: Notes-HowCloseToManagingImpactOfOthersUse
elements.title: Notes

elements.name: HowSatisfiedWithProgress
elements.title: How satisfied are you with your progress towards achieving your substance use goals?

elements.name: ConfidenceAlongside
elements.title: Has your confidence in managing things for yourself improved since you started working with the Alongside program?

elements.name: Past4WkQualityOfLifeScore
elements.title: So, now we've gone through everything, how would you rate your quality of life over the last 4 weeks?

elements.name: Notes-Past4WkQualityOfLifeScore
elements.title: Notes

elements.name: ConnectionToServices
elements.title: Were you connected with services to support you, when you exited Directions program(s)?

elements.name: SupportFromWhichOtherServices
elements.title: Which services?
choices: Other alcohol and drug treatment service

pages.title: Where are you at, right now?

elements.name: SupportTypeBestMatchesNeedsGoals
elements.title: What type of support best matches client needs and goals ?
choices: AOD Brief Intervention (1-3 sessions, then review)
AOD counselling & support (3 - 6 sessions, then review)
Group participation - ADAPT / SMART Recovery / COMPASS / Butt it Out

choices.value: Arcadia Residential Service - Non-medicated Detox Program 1 week
choices.text: Arcadia House Residential Non-medicated Detox Program 1 week

choices.value: Arcadia Residential Service - 12 week Transition Program
Arcadia Residential Service - 12 week Day Program

choices: Support, information and/or counselling as a family member or friend of a person with a substance use issues

elements.name: ExternalReferrals
elements.title: External referrals required to match client needs and goalsÂ (if changed)

elements.name: RiskAssessmentChecklist
elements.title: RISK ASSESSMENT CHECKLIST

choices.text: Any indication of mental health risks?
Any indication of domestic / family violence?

elements.name: RiskAssessmentNotes
elements.title: Risk Assessment Notes

elements.name: FinalChecklist
elements.title: CHECKLIST

choices.text: Feedback provided to external referrer, if required
